name: joyreactor.ru restyle
description: Modifies the background image to another one (see screenshots) and moves logo to the side. Doesn't move the right column to the left side - see http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/95545 for this.
additional_info:
Author      : jrwisard
Updated     : 25th April, 2011
Description : Modifies the background and moves logo
Usage       : Use with Stylish Firefox extension
